thread.title: Flybe hand luggage restrictions

author: Lizzie Porter
title: Flybe hand luggage restrictions
text: How many pieces of luggage can I bring in the cabin with me? One. Size : 55 x 40 x 23cm, including wheels and handles. Allowances are smaller for flights operated by franchise and codeshare partners such as Stobart Air and Logan Air. See Flybe's cabin bag guidelines page for full information . Weight : 10kg Am I allowed any items in addition to my one cabin bag ? Each passenger is allowed to carry one bag of items bought at departures in the airport. Can I book a hold bag on a single leg only, and travel hand-luggage only on the other? If you want to book a flight in one direction only, you have to ring the call centre to do so. Related Articles Monarch cabin luggage restrictions 03 Aug 2015 Jet2 cabin luggage restrictions 03 Aug 2015 Thomson hand luggage restrictions 03 Aug 2015 Thomas Cook hand luggage restrictions 03 Aug 2015 Suggested suitcase: John Lewis Basics 4-Wheel Cabin Suitcase Price: Â£55 Size: 55cm x 35cm x 22cm Details: johnlewis.com Baggage choice by Soo Kim
